name: Mini Monk Fight - Play Free 8-bit Retro Pixel Fighting Games
name_original: Mini Monk Fight - Play Free 8-bit Retro Pixel Fighting Games
description:
Monk of the 8-bit empire is here for some kung-fu practice and its time to demolish few pipes

* 8-Bit Simple Gameplay
* Control with just a tap
* Extremely Addictive
* Looks easy but it is not, almost impossible
* Have full potential to make you crazy
* Shop for Character Selection included

** Fit for everyone, every time, everyplace : getting bored in class or in office, play it with just a tap and kill some time in quality way

** FREE, FREE, FREE, Score high to unlock more characters.

Don't think its just an ordinary game. It is cleverly made insanely addictive and near impossible hard. Do try!!!
